subject: Basketball
Police Brutality, Misconduct and Shootings
lead_paragraph: C. J. Miles scored 25 points, George Hill added 24, and together they keyed a 7-2 spurt to open the second overtime as Indiana beat Washington.
snippet: C. J. Miles scored 25 points, George Hill added 24, and together they keyed a 7-2 spurt to open the second overtime as Indiana beat Washington.
